title: Can I get my old PBE account?
body: I have a PBE account which was disabled because it was not linked to my live account. Now that signups are back can I link my old account and enable it?

replies.body: It sounds like your previous PBE account was a legacy, which was disabled for all players.  You might be better off making an account with the new sign up, but you can also submit an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can look into this for you.

It was extremely legacy, but I got it re-enabled back in 2015. For some reason I didn't get it linked though. So it got disabled again. I sent a support ticket recently but the account recovery folks couldn't do anything since I never got my PBE account linked to my live account.

I've just signed up for a new one but it would still be nice to recover my old one if possible.
